phrases.phrase: Enable node images
This option applies to specific node layouts specified from style properties.
[XM] XenMake Style Properties
Customizable and advanced style features options.
Conversation as read
Select the image you want to show in the category blocks. The image you select will apply to the category blocks.
Category block header image
No images were selected for the category block header

Enter the image URLs to display for dual column mode. This feature works only if the "Dual column image" option in the XenMake Style Properties is active. Please make sure if it's enabled or not in ↓├ XenMake ┤ Node/Forum list area.

You can also upload your images to the default directory specified below..
Select the category header image
Select the image you want to show in the links nodes. The image you select will apply to the forum link nodes.

No images were selected for the link node.
No images were selected for the node.
No images were selected for the page node.

Select the image you want to show in the forum nodes. The image you select will apply to the forum nodes.
Open Background Chooser
Select the image you want to show in the page nodes. The image you select will apply to the forum page nodes.
